data.title: Crystal Announces Exclusive Gloria Gaynor Performance This October
data.meta_description: Crystal have announced that two-time Grammy Award-winning artist Gloria Gaynor will grace the stage aboard Crystal Serenity on the 26th October
data.text:
Crystal have announced that two-time Grammy Award-winning artist Gloria Gaynor will grace the stage aboard Crystal Serenity on the 26th October sailing from Québec City to Fort Lauderdale. Guests will be in for an unforgettable experience as they embark on a journey filled with a mesmerizing performance and exceptional experiences.

Known worldwide for her timeless hits like “I Will Survive” and “Never Can Say Goodbye”, Ms. Gaynor has been a trailblazer in the music industry for decades. Her powerful voice and captivating stage presence continue to captivate audiences across the globe. Now, those sailing aboard Crystal Serenity will have the exclusive opportunity to witness her talent up close and personal.

“Hosting Gloria Gaynor is a testament to our commitment to providing outstanding entertainment experiences for our guests,” said Crystal’s Vice President of Entertainment Keith Cox. “Her legendary status and unparalleled talent perfectly align with the calibre of entertainment that Crystal is known for.”

Gaynor’s performance with her 10-piece will feature a selection of her greatest hits, ensuring an electrifying atmosphere for all to enjoy. Additionally, she will participate in an intimate Q&A session for booked guests.

“I am overjoyed to join Crystal Serenity for what promises to be an unforgettable voyage,” said Gaynor. “Music has the power to bring people together, and I am honoured to share my passion with the discerning guests of Crystal.”

The 14-night sailing heads south down the East Coast, experiencing the best of North America during one of the most beautiful times of the year. With overnights in Boston and New York City, along with a stop in Nassau before ending in Fort Lauderdale, guests will have ample time to discover some of the country’s most fascinating East Coast cities while enjoying the exquisite accommodations, world-class cuisine and award-winning service that Crystal has to offer.
